text: Hello channel, could someone please sanity check my dnd hierarchy represented in <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1NmqpB0mMuucPN3WDGbIESgpKVsySYCsgTUM2dX-qAHg/edit?usp=sharing|this spreadsheet>? I am having trouble getting the internal columns to display side-by-side. They appear properly in the content editor (see 'desired page' attached) but not in the published page (see 'actual page' attached) where the second one stacks under the first. HNY!
